EmailTemplate.name: Registration Registered For Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for reaching out and congrats on your new YETI product.
I have your new YETI product registered on your account. Your gift should be mailed to the address provided within 4-6 weeks.
If I can help with anything else, please do not hesitate to give us a shout.
Enjoy your YETI!
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
